item.title: 使用 operator-sdk 生成一个CRD
item.description: What is CRD The CustomResourceDefinition API resource allows you to define custom resources. Defining a CRD object creates a new custom resource with a name and schema that you specify. The Kubernetes API serves and handles the storage of your custom resource. The name of a CRD object must be a valid DNS subdomain name. more detailed info please refer to CRD definition What is operator-sdk The SDK provides the
